problem_text_cn: 如图,在矩形ABCD中,对角线长2,且∠1=∠2=∠3=∠4,则四边形EFGH的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangle ABCD, the diagonal length is N_0, and ∠1 = ∠2 = ∠3 = ∠4, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral EFGH is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠1=∠2=∠3=∠4,∴∠GHE=∠GFE,∠HGF=∠HEF,在四边形GHEF中,∠GHE+∠HGF=180°,∠GHE+∠HEF=180°,故可得HG∥EF,GF∥HE,HGFE是平行四边形,∴△AHG≌△CFE,△DGF≌△BEH,△BEH∽△CEF,△DGF∽△CEF,∴\frac{BE}{CE}=\frac{BH}{CF}=\frac{DF}{FC},∴EF∥BD,同理HG∥BD,∴\frac{GF}{AC}=\frac{GD}{AD},\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{AG}{AD},∴\frac{GF}{AC}+\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{AG}{AD}+\frac{GD}{AD}=1,又∵\frac{GF}{AC}+\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{GF}{AC}+\frac{HG}{AC},AC=BD,即GF+HG=AC=2,∴四边形EFGH的周长=2(GF+HG)=4．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题考查了矩形的性质及相似三角形的性质,题目看着比较简单,但不容易想出求解思路,解答本题的关键是得出比例式\frac{GF}{AC}=\frac{GD}{AD},\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{AG}{AD},难度较大．
